subcategories.name: Indian History
subcategories.description: Explore the rich and diverse history of India from ancient civilizations to modern times
subcategories.metaDescription: Study comprehensive materials on Indian history including ancient civilizations, medieval empires, colonial period, and independence movement.

subcategories.name: World Wars
subcategories.description: Learn about the two major global conflicts that shaped the 20th century
subcategories.metaDescription: Study materials covering the World Wars, including causes, key events, important figures, and global impact.

subcategories.name: European History
subcategories.description: Discover the historical events and civilizations that shaped Europe
subcategories.metaDescription: Study European history through comprehensive materials on ancient Greece, Roman Empire, Middle Ages, Renaissance, and modern Europe.

subcategories.name: Physics
subcategories.description: Explore the fundamental principles that govern the physical world
subcategories.metaDescription: Study physics with materials covering mechanics, thermodynamics, electromagnetism, quantum physics, and relativity theory.

subcategories.name: Biology
subcategories.description: Learn about living organisms, their structure, function, growth, and evolution
subcategories.metaDescription: Comprehensive study materials on biology covering cell biology, genetics, evolution, ecology, and human physiology.

subcategories.name: Chemistry
subcategories.description: Discover the composition, structure, properties, and changes of matter
subcategories.metaDescription: Study chemistry with materials on atomic structure, chemical bonding, reactions, organic chemistry, and biochemistry.

subcategories.name: Physical Geography
subcategories.description: Study the natural features and processes of the Earth's surface
subcategories.metaDescription: Learn about physical geography including landforms, climate systems, natural resources, and environmental processes.

subcategories.name: Human Geography
subcategories.description: Explore how humans interact with and shape their environments
subcategories.metaDescription: Study human geography with materials on population, cultural patterns, economic activities, urban development, and geopolitics.

subcategories.name: Movies
subcategories.description: Explore the world of cinema, including films, directors, awards, and film history
subcategories.metaDescription: Study materials on film history, movie awards, iconic directors, and significant movements in cinema history.
